title: The Road of Adaptive AI for Precision in Cybersecurity
summary: Cybersecurity's evolving complexity presents unique challenges and opportunities for AI research and practice. This paper shares key lessons and insights from designing, building, and operating production-grade GenAI pipelines in cybersecurity, with a focus on the continual adaptation required to keep pace with ever-shifting knowledge bases, tooling, and threats.
